items.title: Army Email
items.text: Provides access to the Army's web mail portal

items.text: Online payroll & accounting system to view pay, travel vouchers, and more

items.text: 24/7 gateway to trusted information, resources and confidential help

items.text: Leadership development tool tailored for career progression

items.text: Collaboration platform including teleconferencing, email, shared drives, and more

items.text: Healthcare program for uniformed service members including health, dental, prescriptions, and more

items.title: ARMA
items.text: Allows soldiers to instantly submit work orders to public works clerks

items.title: ASAP
items.text: Connects soldiers to resources for the Army Substance Abuse Program

items.title: SHARP
items.text: Connects soldiers to resources for the Sexual Harassment/Assault Response and Prevention program
